text: Rude and dishonest. Asked for the bigger portion at $5.50 instead of $4.50. Was given a miserable portion of rice and the amount of chicken meat was like no difference with the smaller portion at $4.50. When asked to add more rice since I already paid $5.50 for the big portion, still had the cheek to charge me an extra $1. Paid $6.50 in total. First and last time here. Avoid this stall unless u enjoy being scammed. To the boss of this stall, U do business like this, better u close shop lah. Big scammer!
Short hair lady vey rude!! Told that half chix i only can buy 5 rice!! I say im paying for it not begging for free!! She reply that how she runs her shop!! As if im not paying for it!!
Usually dont write review..but $8.30 for this... over priced and stall personnel was very rude.. Please avoid getting cheat. And this is my 2nd post. They delete the 1st.
Best halal chicken rice after Tong Seng closed down. Always long queue. But taste is definitely worth it.

used to be my fav chicken rice place but recently they increased the price (i guess it’s okay cuz times r hard) when u up the price but quality stays, nevermind. but seems like they r out to cheat their customers cuz chicken rice quality dropped, now they pack more rice but less chicken. even bought a WHOLE chicken the other day and guess wot, missing all the breast part lol never coming back ever again

can’t believe this is how they treat their loyal customers.
